sentences: Before pursuing a music career, he studied psychology and history at Morehouse College in Atlanta.
While studying at L.I.U, instructor Michael Carvin secured Waits a spot in the percussion ensemble M'Boom, started by drummer Max Roach and Freddie Waits, in 1970.
